name: Vengeance: Lost Love
description: When an urban legend comes true, Amada's family gets caught up in the haunting secrets of the mysterious lone miner. Uncover secrets long forgotten in this intense and enticing hidden object adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP/WindowsVista/Windows7/Windows8/Windows10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Basic 3D accelerator (No pixel shader support required) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
